content.detailedDescription: I had just finished dinner and stepped out on my balcony. it was an exceptionally clear night with a lot of stars out. i saw a plane and constellations just before i saw what originally appeared to be a star moving. the object didn't have any indication lights and appeared to look like a boomerang on my camera lens. the object sped up and then changed direction a couple of times and each time the object changed altitude quite quickly as well. once again the object totally stopped before taking off rapidly. it was still quite bright and then it simply faded out. i found it strange that it was totally silent and had a pinkish glow to it. very interesting! it didn't appear to be anything like the phoenix lights my family and i witnessed during the late nineties, it seemed brighter and a different color and made faster directional changes.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright boomerang

content.detailedDescription: It all started when i had my friends over for a all-nighter nerf battle. we slept outside in tents.  after the battle, we laid in the tent and went to sleep.  before that, we saw two parallel "stars,"the two brightest lights in the night sky.  they moved up, then down, then up, then down again, and never appeared again. then, we went to sleep. around one am, something woke me up. it wasn't a noise though. usually secadas are buzzing like crazy, but now they stopped. i looked at my watch and it was one am.  it seemed liked 20 seconds, but it was hours that passed according to my watch. the craft was orange, with three dark lights in the shape of a triangle, but the lights themselves were circular. around the lights emitted a rainbow colored translucent light.  it was bigger than almost anything i've ever seen. it was much higher than the tree tops, but lower than a plane.  then, it stopped hovering and moved  north, stopped in midair and went south. in less than a second it hit the horizon and was gone. i don't know why i didn't immediately report it; maybe i was scared; i don't know. what i know is that i do want peace on the topic, clearance of mind. i also regret not writing down what i saw right away, but i remember it better than yesterday. i also woke one of my friends, and he saw it too. i said we should just go to sleep and discuss it in the morning. neither of us mentioned it that night. the next day, i asked him what he saw, and he described it to the mark, i couldn't have just dreamed it up. now, years later, i decided to come forward with my story. what i saw that night was beyond our technology, or at least the technology that the government lets us know about. i feel privileged to have seen what i did, but scared at what it may have been. i need answers, one way or another.
content.summary: Brightly colored disk

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting on front porch, 3rd story. my girlfriend sighted it and shouted: "get up and look at this! right now!" i jumped up and we both witnessed the object for about 5-10 more seconds. girlfriend saw it for 4-5 more seconds than me.

the object had no lights, made no sound, but caught your eye because it was much darker than the night sky, a dark grey/black, huge, and bizarre looking! giant curving appendages protruding from a cylindrical/rectangular center space. each appendage had a distinct orb/sphere/fist on it's end. the orb's diameter was about twice the width of the appendage.

  it was large, low, and close. less than a few blocks away it seemed flying directly down college/287-south. i'd say no more than 500-feet high? hard for me to judge.

when i first noticed it i had no idea what the object was. as the details of it's shape took focus i immediately felt chills down my spine and goosebumps all over because it just looked unnatural. my brain was in shock. i still have no idea what it was but we have taken to referring to it as the "giant flying octopus"

it did not stray in altitude up or down. it did not change it's path or speed in the slightest. that was part of how strange it was. it just hovered moving very quickly in a southern direction. the appendages definitely moved. 

we were both moved to a very intense state of awareness, something very primal feeling. we were scared. we had just seen something that we had no words for. no objects that came close to being a comparison in our heads were available. you feel vulnerable, curious, intensely awake/aware. it's a strange feeling to see something that your brain says, "that isn't supposed to exist" in response to.

immediately after seeing it and initially oohh'ing and ahh'ing we went inside, tore two pieces of paper out of her notebook and drew what we saw on opposite sides of the room to compare what we think we saw.

we lost sight of the object as it went past the wall of our porch/apartment.
content.summary: Darker than sky background, grey, rectangle/cylindrical center,8-10 tentacle appendages spheres on end.260-degree octopus

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were leaving the v.A.M.C. hospital after work,  heading for our vehicle.  i glanced up at the stars and noted the stars being blocked by an invincible rectangle  heading in a southern direction.  ten streamers were behind it.  i asked my wife if she saw the same thing and she said yes,  what is that?  another nursing personnel came out,  and we said mary mary look up at the stars,  do you see that disturbance and she said yes,  what is that?  this happened around 1992?  we still remember it well.  as it got closer to the horizon it disappeared and the stars were once again visible.  i`ll swear this on a bible.  honest to gosh . . .                 another event happened in november of 1982,  in broad daylight. my wife and i were returning home,  and came to a stop for traffic.  i looked up at the clouds for they were a heavy dark gray color.  all of a sudden a square like box went from one cloud into another.  i told my wife to watch and sure enough it came out and into another cloud.  she said yes she sees it.  it was square with a metal look. i grayish color kind of matching the clouds.  we were looking north and it was heading slowly east.  than it just vanished in the clouds not to be seen again.                                                                       a third siting was over near marionville,  pa.  the wife and i were camping at the borther-in-laws camp.  we were sleeping in the back of the pick-up truck (cap).  my wife and our dog were sleeping.  i awoke about 4 am and noted flashing pulsating lights above, just above the tree line.  it almost seemed like it was mapping the area?  it was large maybe 80-100 foot,  shaped like a tear.  it was pulsesating and the bottom looked like lighening bolts on its hull.   it move away,  than returned,  than away several times,  and back again?  than it was gone.  i mentioned it to the brother-in-law and he just looked at me like i was crazy.  i do not lie,  but this was what i saw.  have not seen anything since.  these were true events.  okay!  i have said my piece,  and sure hope you make note of it?  yours truly,  allen r.Linda s. shoemaker   erie,  pa.
content.summary: Rectangular shape blocking out the stars with ten trailers (smoke like)

content.detailedDescription: I was on vacation with my parents and my college roommate. my parents had rented a houseboat on lake shasta. that night, my roommate and i decided to sleep on the roof of the houseboat in our sleeping bags. the sky was clear and there were many falling stars. suddenly, my friend asked "wow, did you see that?!" i asked "you mean that falling star that stopped, zig zagged, and then took off in another direction?" he said "yes". we both saw the same thing. the object appeared just as a bright light, like a falling star. but nothing from this earth moves like this. the zig zag pattern and the speed at which it took off in a different direction was more abrupt and faster than anything humans are capable of making.
content.summary: Appeared as falling star but stopped suddenly, zig zagged, changed direction

content.detailedDescription:
My son and i were at home and decided to see if we could catch a glimpse of the lyrid meteor shower at approximately 4.30 am. we were both looking up trying to see some sign of the meteor shower when my son drew my attention to this red object very high up in the night sky.

it was the weirdest thing! the object was very high up (way higher than a plane or helicopter would fly) and was swiftly moving (darting) really fast from west to south east before pausing and disappearing. the entire object was red in colour and flashing (faster than that of a plane light). we could not make out the actual shape as it was so high up and moved so fast.

at first i thought that it had to be a satellite. however, a bit of research has led me to believe otherwise. this object was very distinct and different to anything i have ever seen. i did not want to take my eyes off the object in case it disappeared so we were unable to take photos or film it. even so, no picture or video could have captured what we saw with our own eyes.
content.summary: Observed a red object (flashing) darting around very high up in sky. the way that it moved, its speed, colour, flashing, everything about it was like no other object i have ever seen. the object stopped moving and then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Early 70ties inside room where i was working. i was inide craft. it appeared it was accidently in wrong location by reaction of alien pilot.Saw interview on tv with man named mac million he talk about plasma tunnels in ocean. please call ican descibe better of what i saw . i also saw what could be power sorce. i can descibe the face, chair,panals,3fingers,sky blue with white mix looked like ocean water,7 tv screens 6 small 1 large in middle of 6 small 3 on each side of large in center,panel under screens, the alien was siting in shaped like old colonial high back chair slots in floor in circle and down middle of circle. please please please call me ihave more .Can only explain verblythank you r b
content.summary: It appeard inside a building please call me

content.detailedDescription: Out shooting hoops in the dark with a friend. at first we both witnessed a shooting star, than about half an hour later he pointed up in the sky and told me to look at that. around the direction of the shooting star, we recognized a ball shaped, penny looking size object from our view of it hovering with some speed and smoothness. it was strange and i truly believe it was a ufo
content.summary: Ironic, weird, nothing ive ever seen

content.detailedDescription:
I didn't going upstairs to bed wbed i saw outside my landing window a bright red object coming towards the house i scrambled up stairs shouting at my husband to wake up and look at this , i ran through the bedroom to the other porch in front of house when we got there, there were 2 of the orbs not 1 flying past they were low over the rooftops and large lights i didn't see any structure to them my husband was disinterested said they were planes and went back to bed i was very excited and don't know why i didn't watch to see where they went.
the size of the orb s were the size of my smart car maybe slightly larger, and they pulsated no noise at all .
that was our 1st sightings when i contacted a friend she said her children saw them. 
we have had more sightings since.
i don't know what made me go to bed when i was so excited maybe my husbands negative vibe
content.summary: Red orb flying over home sighted size of cabin of 2 man helicopter no wings

content.detailedDescription: While coming home from buckeye lake from a fishing trip with my grandson, i looked to the south of route 70 as i was coming home, noticed a strange shaped gray/black cloud shaped like a rectangle . it hovered for a moment then fell straight to the ground.Was unable to see where it landed due to trees in the background.I was west bound on rt 70approx 3mile east of route 256
content.summary: Rectangle, looked like a cloud of darkened smoke

content.detailedDescription: I live in west virginia, that's eastern united states , i was on my poor blast night april 25, 2014. there i stood watching the fire flies fly and glow out in the woods. i noticed what appeared to be a slow moving shooting start fly east towards me. it was a vague star like the ones that look to be the small ones in the night sky. oh wait prior to that i seen airplanes, i live pretty much in the middle between two fairly small airports "huntington and yeager in charleston wv. so this star headed east then i tried to get my girlfriends attention, an she seen it. after i told her to ask mom if she wanted to see a ufo the star like object made a quick like gradual 90 degree turn to the north. slowly it went out of sight.
content.summary: It looked like a star moving an when i yelled for my family it changed direction an went out of site

content.detailedDescription: I had just gotten out of the shower and then i sat on the toilet. i was going to the bathroom (naked) and i felt like someone was watching me, i grabbed a towel and put it around me. when i looked up i saw an orange ball of light in the window. it was hovering like it was watching me, it was pulsating kind of, then it took off in a blink if an eye. after i got dressed i was blow drying my hair and i looked up and it was hovering above the skylight watching me. i looked up just long enough to see it then it was gone.  later that night around 10 o'clock to midnight somewhere around there, my daughter started yelling for me. i opened her door and she was screaming "get down, get down" and i crawled over to her bed and she said that there was a ufo,aliens watching her and she describes the same orange ball of light that i saw earlier. before this happened, you feel like someone is watching you then you  just kind of feel violated. but you know it was there to watch you. my daughted felt like they were going to take her. leaving a mom terrified and paranoid.
content.summary: Hovered in window then skylight then came back at night hovered in window

content.detailedDescription:
Ovni est france nombre de temoins militaires fran����ais 14
section ******
photo prise au bon moment juste avant un brouillage total des communication et probl����me de mat����rielles.
content.summary: Ovni est france nombre de temoins militaires franã§ais 14

content.detailedDescription:
As i am typing this, the ufo sighting is taking place. i went outside to smoke a cigarette and scanned the night sky like i always do. then to the east, i notice this shining light that looks like a shining star but it is far too bright to be any visible star close to earth and it was never there before. as i looked closer i noticed that i had seen this light before, in the same direction maybe a month or so before this event.( it's still out there but closer now, and brighter). at first when i was looking at it it looked stationary; below the normal cloud line about where a helicopter would typically fly. i tried to dismiss it as an incoming plane since i live within a couple miles of oia. but you could definitely tell that it was no plane or any earthen aircraft. then it began to move. not like any flying object i have ever seen move before. it was as if it could distort gravity around it and move in any direction it wanted. not just up, down, left, right, side to side, horizontal, but directions i can't even describe. it changed in elevation just as rapidly, every move was in an instant. it moved like it was an object suspended in a glass of water and someone was swirling the water around in a circular motion. it's 5:49am now and it's gone.  i didn't see it leave. but now the moon is out right where the aircraft was and it was not there a few minutes ago. 
after i noticed the way it moved, as if it was just observing everything, i had an overwhelming sense of being watched or stared at. it did even come closer towards my direction. i really wouldn't have given it much thought or even reported this sighting had i not seen it once before, and i believe even another time before that. i don't know what it is, if it's a government drone or an extra terrestrial aircraft... i just can't say. but it sure does give me the creeps. i had to watch it from inside once i noticed it getting closer. i'd really like to know if anyone else in my area has seen the same thing or if it has been reported elsewhere. whatever it is, it was definitely intelligent, and very technologically advanced to fly in such a fashion. i await it's return.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Re-occuring ufo sighting, oject looks like it's observing the area

content.detailedDescription: While traveling westbound on st rt 36 coming into coshocton in september 2008, my wife and i were riding our motorcycles home. it was a beautiful fall day and as i rounded a gentle curve surrounded by a hill i noticed 3 identically shaped clouds in the sky. i thought that was really neat as they were also in a perfect triangle formation and stationary. i looked to see if they possibly came from a local power plant stack located to the south of the clouds so i could judge if the wind pushed them north and found nothing emitting from their stack but steam that quickly dissipated. the little wisp of wind there was came from the west i noticed also while observing the steam. when i looked back to the area above the trees on the horizon of the hill.. the clouds were gone! from the angle i was at these 3 clouds were each the size of a cantaloupe at arms length, so for them to just disappear with no trace in just a few seconds was unexplainable. i was stopped at a traffic light a half mile from the point where i saw them and there was not a cloud in the sky anywhere. i felt almost shaky and was glad that we caught the red light so i could take a few seconds to reclaim myself. i found myself looking in the sky trying to find them again with no luck. i spent the rest of our 40 mile trip home looking into the sky and never saw another cloud in any direction of the sky the rest of the trip. when we got home i asked my wife if she noticed anything odd in coshocton and explained what and where i saw this and she was concentrating on maintaining her lane and saw nothing. i have only told a few people of this and thought this forum might be a place to offer what i experienced.
content.summary: Cloud like shapes witnessed

content.detailedDescription: I was a kid  ten years of age, my dad ,a friend,and myself were running trout lines on the walbash river in 1960 ,when i just happened to look up and seen this craft, i ask my father what it was , he had no answer , it was metalic looking like oxydies aluminum sperical craft with flats completely covering it similar to a geodesic home of today, but the flats were trapizoidal in their shape.It had four bars that seemed to be4/6 feet in length extruding out from the surface of the sphere, at top & bottom about a 1/4 from top & bottom . red light on top with what looked like a atenna on top , green light on bottom with antenna . the craft was completely silent ,it also was moving about 4 miles / hr. turning slowly the whole time it was moving in a horizontal clockwise movement. it maintained this treetop hieght and  a controlled movement following the river, followed eastwardly then going south around a bend in the river which then went back north following the river until because of  the trees finally lost sight of the craft. i seen this craft 53 yrs ago , i've never seen anything like it since, not in any air craft books ,ufo books or tv shows, to this day i'm still puzzled to just what it was we seen. the image of this craft is still burnt into my memory.Would love to know what this thing was. the three of us were all in just awe of what we were seeing , but no one knew what it was.And still don't.
content.summary: Craft spherical with flats all over / 8 bars coming out followed river@ tree top high no sound 1960 year.

content.detailedDescription: My mom noticed the object first then informed the rest of the family. it was small but when you saw this object you could easily see that it was moving, and fast. we watched it travel then disappear but we were amazed so we kept looking at the sky that's when we saw the same thing happen again but in a different area. we kept looking at the sky and it happened again this time closer to the little dipper. this one went toward the direction that the second one disappeared and they all traveled in straight lines. we watched all of this in bewilderment and i myself with a mixture of bewilderment and fear. i know that when i was inside my tv turned off randomly but i thought nothing of it at first then someone phone went off during the event. we tried to capture this one camera but were unable to because i wouldn't show up. we all decided to go inside but then my mom saw something different; an orb like object that we had seen moving was now hovering/stationary at a distance but looked to be over our neighbors house from our angle. this object had a white blinking light like the others but it seemed brighter. oh and there was a helicopter flying in the area at about the time that the second object was traveling or disappeared. we thought these thongs were stars dying but dying stars don't move in a straight line.
content.summary: At first there was one that looked like a star but then we all saw it move then disappear. same thing happened again two times afterwards. one was by the little dipper, the other by the north star.

content.detailedDescription:
I lived out in the woods above foresthill, ca.  i had to meet a trucker in auburn and left my house around 1:00 am.  i stopped about halfway to the paved road and when i got out a bright white light came from my left.  it turned the forest into day.  it was a bright white light.  to me it seemed like it lasted forever, but it was only two minutes, max.
i was afraid, not knowing what this was, but i pulled my gun and then started laughing.  anything that bright, moving through the air as slow as it was, would tell you you would not hurt it.  i just laughed at it. had whatever was driving that ship wanted me i knew they could take me whenever they wanted.
it was a brilliant white light  in the sky.  brighter than daylight, but it did not hurt your eyes.
it kept going.  i told my friends and they laughed, but we were eating breakfast, reading the newspaper, and it had been seen by people across the canyon, in placerville.

whatever it was it definetly was not a baloon or anything like that.  it passed overhead and usually you would be frightened, but it only frightened me for an instant.  i saw its shape, etc, but the light was welcoming rather than frightening.

harry harrington
content.summary: It came over me from the north.  it was moving slow, bright white.  maybe doing 5 mph..

content.detailedDescription: My wife called me to the bedroom and pointed out two orange lights twirling around each other. after a few minutes, a third orb entered the airspace and they all left heading east toward camelback mountain. these lights were orange in color and seemed to move in a very strange fashion. they were about 100-200ft above the street. the speed and movement was very unusual and was unlike any aircraft i have ever seen. they also did not appear to have any structure to them, just glowing red/orange light.
content.summary: Three orbs interacting with each other.

content.detailedDescription: At my house. and my 2 daughters, friend, and i were watching the iss pass over dothan. we saw something floating beside it.They were like a mile apart. the object was floating right beside it for about 3 min. it was going in a straight line. everyone was surpized, scared, and awesome. it was moving at about 17,000 mi. a second.
content.summary: My daughters and i went outside to watch the iss fly over dothan. thats when we saw an ufo flying near it.

content.detailedDescription: Every night for the past 2 weeks or so, there has been a glittering anomaly in our sky.  it hovers for about an hour. the light gets very bright and changes colors from white to all rainbow colors.  the light will all of a sudden flicker.  it breaks into 2, 3 then 4 lights floating and then they combine back into one light and very slowly eventually floats away to the right then disappears.  when my daughter called out to it with her mind to come closer , the light got extremely bright and came closer and then the light faded off.
content.summary: We see an unusual light every night visiting us.

content.detailedDescription:
I am only doing this to find out if anyone has ever had a similar experience. i still believe it was a dream most likely but i will say this, it was the most real dream i have ever had in my entire life.  to the point i still struggle with the question of was it a dream or not.

it was a warm spring night.  it was between  12.30 am and 1:30am i was waiting for a call from a friend i met online.  i was in fact bored and tired of waiting so i laid straight back on my bed.  legs over the side because i wanted to be able to hop right up and get the call.  

next thing i remember was my window rattling which startled me but i sat right up.  it's like i knew because in my head i heard come to the door, you will not be harmed.   the funny part is i can control my dreams and if it happened in a dream i wouldn't go to that door without a bazooka.  but i did go, willingly.  i remember getting up, walking out my door and down the hallway to the dining room where i turned to face the dining room door that leads to the deck.

at this point i heard in my head, come to the door.  i felt very apprehensive here and hesitated so the voice said come to the door you won't be harmed.  so i walked to the door.  at this point i heard unlock the door.  well i hesitated and looked to my left a bit and up just a little.  i'm 4 ft 10 and disabled.  i'd put this creature at 5ft.  anyway, i saw something looking at me.  with your typical large black eyes that seem to be able to somehow penetrate you.  i looked back to the door and heard unlock the door, you won't be harmed again.  i reached for the lock but stopped and said fine but i remember everything.  you don't take my memories, you let me remember.  i didn't hear a no or yes, just come out but i felt like he understood me.    so i unlocked the door and went out.  

once out, we started across the deck but 3 feet and i stopped and looked at the being.  it was about 5 ft, large black eyes with large head, skinny body but he thing that struck me at the time was the  grayish white body.  it wasn't the typical gray i'd always read about.  anyway, i asked if i could touch him.  so he held out his arm, very thin.  my bones are thin and his arm may have been more thin than even mine.  i also noted it had arm hair like us but that unlike human hair that is soft and lays flat, it had very stiff hair that stood straight up.  it's skin was smooth but sort of bumpy, like a lizards might feel like?  it didn't look like a lizard though.   it had feet, legs, arms and hands.  i think it had only 4 fingers but i don't remember.  

so we started walking again, this time it rested his hand on my arm but i felt like it was more to assert more control.  maybe to avoid more delays who knows.  we walked to the end od the deck ramp then down a grassy slope off to the right.  at the bottom i looked up and saw the outline of a very dark craft that i only aw because the moon which was mostly behind clouds barely lit up an outline of the craft.  it was not the typical triangle i'd read about either.  it had 3 lights.  one toward each side and one in the center.  i only remember the one in the center which was blue, pulsating a bit.  a blue beam, a crystalline clear blue beam came down about 3 ft around.  i noted that it didn't glow or radiate light outward like well, any normal light might.  instead it seemed to cut through the night.  i heard a voice say step in the center.  i did and then heard just as i was thinking how cool the light was, don't touch the light and keep your hands at your sides.

then i went up.  it got fuzzy there quick.  i remember turning to see the same being standing to the left of a chair and behind him a screen.  i saw my home, then in a flash, the earth.  i then looked to my right and saw to the far right, the wall which looked like a liquid silvery material, essentially melt away from right to left, revealing an examination room.  trust me i've been in a ton of hospitals i know what they look like.  from there i started walking toward it not remotely afraid.  i've been experimented on my whole life by human doctors lol i really didn't care.   the next thing i know i was waking up in my bed, laying flat, covers over me and it was 3.30 am.

i'm certain it was a dream but some nagging question like why do i remember this dream so clearly.  why do i remember walking barefoot down the hall and outside.  more odd why was that literally the only dream i have ever had where i could even see my feet or feel my legs and why do i remember using my cane when in my entire life, i have never had a dream where i used a cane, ever.
content.summary: I just don't know.

content.detailedDescription:
During a january meteor shower i was laying out side with my boyfriend watching the night sky. we live out in the wooded country like area. we were out side for a few hours and about to retire for the night when i asked him to stay outside with me for just a few more minutes. we were south facing, but looking south west when we heard this roaring "swwwoooshh" coming from the south east. at first it just appeared to be the biggest meteor we've ever seen. it illuminated our entire house enough to cast shadows on the ground!. it was as if someone turned a spot light on us! it seemed to be closer to us rather than the other meteors that we had been watching fly by in the outer atmosphere. this "meteor" and its tail took up the entire sky from east to west and it was extremely loud and startling and felt like it was "right over our heads!'. an ultra violet tube like beam came out of the tip of the meteor going straight "up" and to the "right" making what appeared to be a perfect right angle (an upside down "l" shape). as this beam shot up and out of the meteor making this right angle it then began to make what looked like 3 explosions (no sound)  of light, the first being white/ultra violet, then light pink, then lavender and it was gone. it looked like it imploded into itself, or as if someone suck it up through a straw until every drop of its illuminating light dissipated. it completely disappeared out of the sky. it lasted probably no longer than 30 seconds, perhaps even 20. we weren't counting. this event that we saw was quick, although it has burned an impression into our minds. like a tiny video playing over and over again. its been a few months now and i still have not come across anything like this in my research. other than one snippet of information i heard recently while listening to a carol romaine podcast with dan willis as her guest. dan quickly mentions being at a conference and meeting an 80 year old woman who described seeing exactly what i saw in her back yard, only she would see these "things" repeatedly. dan apparently went to her house and witnessed one of these experiences with her! dan concludes that statement with a chuckle and states "..But thats a whole other story!" then moves onto other topics of ufos. i emailed him through facebook, but have not heard back, yet. i am still trying to figure out what that beam of light was and why or how or what made that beautiful tye-dye..Firework-like..Triple explosion of pastel colored lights in the sky above us.  in my opinion, this was much more than just an exploding meteor. to answer question 5: ....At first i was in awe! i've never seen anything like that in my life. after we heard it rushing through the sky, my boyfriend and i were watching it with our jaws on the floor and simultaneously we both let out the same two long drawn out words " ooooohhhhh sssshhhhiiiiiittttttt!". those were the only too words we said while watching this happen. when it was "gone", the first thought that popped into my head was "time travelers!" and we laughed at my silly comment and thought "dang, i've watched too many scifi movies!". we were both stunned & amazed & a little bewildered because we didn't know what that was we had seen. over all, it was beautiful, exciting, joyous, peaceful and a lovely experience.  we hope to witness another one! since this experience we have become avid sky watchers. we try to spend at least 1 hour sky gazing every night. 

have any of you mufon'ers heard of something like this? or experienced one? 

thanks!! ..Love & light

ashlee
content.summary: Roaring comet that exploded into pink, violet & utra voilet light with a bean of light coming out of the tip making a right angle

content.detailedDescription:
One of my dogs alerted me to what i thought was something in my garden.
i looked out and suddenly my utility room outside wall became mildly illuminated, and then a tree on the other side of my garden fence also lit up with 2 or 3 larger lights of differing sizes and lots of smaller lights in and around the right side of the tree. i also saw a single light almost directly above me; although slightly forward and to the left of my position, that was constantly moving in short jumps.
content.summary: 3 light sources in area of back garden. 1 source was many rounded lights of differing sizes in a tree

content.detailedDescription: My husband, my best friend and i were sitting on our patio, just hanging out and talking. i happened to notice what i thought to be a plane flying directly overhead and thought, 'that plane is really up there' because the brightness of it was not like i'm used to seeing. it just seemed really far away. then i noticed another light in front of it that seemed to be 'leading' it or 'towing' it. i said, 'what the...?' and my husband and best friend looked to see what i was looking at. we watched it for a few minutes, as it headed southeast. it seemed to be traveling in a very purposeful manner, not wavering, not changing direction in any way. it then disappeared - not into the horizon like you would expect a plane to do, but just disappeared as if it were traveling up. there were no sounds, the lights did not blink, they were both solid white - the one behind brighter than the other. i'm pretty sure planes don't tow each other mid-air. and we know what satellites look like and what meteors look like. this was definitely something other than a satellite or meteor. this is my second sighting (the first one was completely different, seeming to be a satellite but abruptly changing direction twice) since we moved into this town home in august 2013. i did not get any video - i doubt it would have shown up with such little light anyway. wondering if we're not the only ones to have seen this...
content.summary: Two lights, one brighter than the other, seemed to be one leading the other

content.detailedDescription:
On 21 april 2014, myself, my son and his wife were traveling back from albuquerque new mexico. they had just returned from a trip and i had picked them up at the airport there. at the time of the sighting, we were traveling east on nm 380 headed towards carrizozo new mexico with an intended destination of alamogordo new mexico. at approximately 0135-0140 hours, my daughter in law noticed lights in the night sky and mentioned them asking her husband what they were.  i didn't see them initially but was able to after we came around a bend and could see over the terrain.

i pulled the car over to the side of the road and initially we were watching the lights from inside the car. i took a few pictures and then began making a video on my cell phone. 

there were 4 lights initially that appeared much closer and much brighter than the stars or any ambient lighting. the lights seemed to descend slowly and also formed in to a triangle shape. 

after a few minutes of observing these initial lights, a set of 4 more appeared. they were higher in elevation and also decended slowly. after about 4 minutes or so, my phone quit recording. 

there were aircraft in the area. we saw at least two that were in very close proximity to the lights. one flew "between" the two sets of lights, and one flew towards the higher set but then turned abruptly and reversed course. 

i found the sightings pretty intriguing. initially i thought that they may have been aircraft flares but the movement in to triangular shapes negates that thought to a degree. flares that i am familiar with are free falling, parachute suspended, and unguided. 

it was interesting to watch them for as long as we did. eventually we lost sight of them over the horizon/behind a hill on the side of the road, but none the less, very intriguing! 

attached are a few phot's we took along with a video that is about 4 minutes long. the quality is fair for the video, but the photo's are a bit grainy and fuzzy due to my unsteady hands. (old age, not fear)
content.summary: Unidentified lights near carrizozo new mexico

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were sitting on the balcony of our condo on orange beach in alabama. it was approx 9pm. we noticed in the south west sky a large orange orb like light appear over the water.  it was very large and very high.  the light multiplied into 2 or 3 more lights- i'm not sure because at this time another light appeared to the left of this one and multiplied into 5 or 6 evenly spaced lights in a straight line and unmoving.  it was so quick and shocking to see. then they disappeared.  they could have been 10 miles out over the gulf- but they were mixed in with the clouds which were spotty.    they made no sound at all.  they seemed like flares or chinese lanterns in appearance but did not act like either one.  the one that lit up in a straight line seemed to all be connected.  we have observed chinese lanterns over our house before and these were different. these would have had to be released from a boat far out in the gulf.
content.summary: Glowing orang orb like lights seen over the gulf of mexico. one emitted a few other orbs. the other lit up into a row of 5 or 6 lights in a row. they were evenly spaced and in a straight line and stationary. they all disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: On april 24, 2014 i was at home.  i was waiting for my boyfriend to get home from work so i opened the front door.  i was watching tv and i noticed out the door a large reddish/orange light coming toward the house.  i was very interested because it was flying fairly low for a commercial plane or even a private plane.  but the light was pretty big.  it was not the lights of an aircraft.  the other thing that got my attention was the fact that it was not flying on a normal airport traffic pattern.  it was coming straight and low so i went to the front door and opened it.  there was no sound.  i think it was about 1000 to 2000 feet above me.  i decided to go out the back door instead since it was about to go over the house.  i thought when i went out i would here the sound as it caught up.  i expected it to be a helicopter.  it was not.  it was a round orb of light.  i didn't see any other part of a craft.  it was only the glowing orb.  it was silent.  it was very quiet outside at 11pm and the weather was pleasant at about 60 degrees.  nothing was blocking my view.  the object continued at the same course and speed and altitude.  i kept watching it until it was about a half mile away and then it disappeared.  i was very surprised.  my first reaction was that it must have been a drone but the light was so large.  i also thought it was a weather balloon because that's the best description of the object, a weather balloon with a red/orange light inside but i dismissed that because i don't think they move in that fashion.  when the object disappeared i also thought that whoever was flying the thing just turned the light off.  i was curious but alone so i posted online that i think i just saw a ufo.  i was reminded that an article was written two tears ago about several people in charlotte experiencing the exact same thing.  i only saw one orb.  the light seemed brighter coming toward me than going away from me.
content.summary: A glowing orb, orange red in color, flying at a steady rate and low altitude.  not flying in a known airport traffic pattern.  flying south to north with no sound.  it disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: We were crossing the new york state thruway driving south to buffalo when i took pictures out the passenger window facing the falls. i did not see the object when i took the picture. i found it while editing months later. i have no idea what it is.
content.summary: I just want to know what it is.

content.detailedDescription: The picture was taken in the evening on the beach at the hilton hawaiian beach resort and ala wai boat harbor in waikiki. my camera recorded the time, however, it must have been on a different time zone, it was closer to 7 or 8pm. i did not see it until i started editing pictures months later.
content.summary: Just wanted someone to look at the image and tell me what it is.
